alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Madison, Lowndes, southern Thomas and southern Brooks Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Thomasville to 7 miles south of Quitman to Valdosta. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Quitman, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Alma, Dills, Grooverville, Everett, Hamburg, Pinetta, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 11, Fincher, Twin Lakes and Festus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
